items.name: ReachFive
items.description: ReachFive provides an identity management platform that enhances user authentication and security.

items.name: StoryStream
items.description: StoryStream offers a platform for managing and leveraging user-generated content to enhance brand storytelling.

items.name: Mapp
items.description: Mapp provides a customer data platform that helps businesses understand and engage their customers effectively.

items.name: mParticle
items.description: mParticle offers a data platform that centralizes customer data from various sources to drive personalized marketing.

items.name: Braze
items.description: Braze provides a customer engagement platform that supports personalized and omnichannel marketing campaigns.

items.name: Iterable
items.description: Iterable offers a cross-channel marketing platform that enables businesses to engage customers with relevant messages.

items.name: Optimove
items.description: Optimove provides a loyalty and CRM platform that enhances customer retention and engagement through data-driven insights.

items.name: Talon.One
items.description: Talon.One offers a promotion and loyalty management platform that enables businesses to create customized loyalty programs.

items.name: Sheer ID
items.description: Sheer ID provides an identity marketing platform that verifies customer eligibility for exclusive offers and discounts.

items.name: Voucherify
items.description: Voucherify offers a promotion engine and API that helps businesses manage and track voucher and coupon campaigns.

items.name: Dynamic Yield
items.description: Dynamic Yield provides a personalization platform that enables businesses to deliver tailored customer experiences.

items.name: trbo
items.description: trbo offers a personalization platform that enhances user engagement and conversion through dynamic content.

items.name: Ninetailed
items.description: Ninetailed provides a headless personalization API that allows businesses to deliver individualized customer experiences.
